title: Are macro's considered cheating?
body: I use razer synapse with my blackwidow and naga hex, and I have the macros set for the basic riven animation cancel combo, jayce Q-E , nasus E-Q, lee Q-Q-Z-W and Rengar combo macroed, are they considered scripts? I havent yet used them in PvP (only testing and polishing in customs), so can I get punished for using them?

replies.body:
Definitely do not recommend using them in-game.  Any 3rd party program (including basic macro programs) that give you an unfair competitive advantage in-game (such as other players not having this) can result in penalties.

The best advice I can give is to keep practicing the combo's so that you can execute them flawlessly without their help! ^.^

But... a lot of keyboards now have those functions. Especially gaming keyboards. Macros have been rather wide-spread for a while now; this feels like the equivalent of someone saying "Use the click option of copy-and-paste rather than use ctrl c+v". We're not talking about a cheat engine, map enhancer, or any kind of modding... this is really basic shortcut mechanics. As someone who doesn't even use macros (but definitely understand their benefit) this seems crazy.

It's kinda ironic that razer has made a league of legends mouse, yet using the razer drivers to their full extent is not allowed.
That and sometimes the macro combo may not always be the best. ;) Keep yourself able to be flexible.
I don't use them.  But from a quick Google search for you I found that macro's are legal so long as they don't interact with game files.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Fury,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OvYEokpp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-16T16:31:01.628+0000)
>
> I don't use them.  But from a quick Google search for you I found that macro's are legal so long as they don't interact with game files.

Text macros for things like "glhf" are allowed, so long as they're not automatic. Using macros to combo spells, automatically call out objective timers, etc. will likely get you banned.

Heya
They are considered cheating since they give you an advantage over other players. So you can get banned for using  them. And yes, they are very easy to detect.

Regards Rkoturdo
